MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-OCT-2020 23:20.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a fault with the power in the PA14 postcode area of Port Glasgow. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:02pm. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:23 PM on Wednesday, 14 October 2020.
